dialog_context: ['yes, i have a zoo. dog, cat, mice, chickens, and quail.', "that's cool. i have two dogs. i don't like mice though", "Mice aren't as bad as everyone thinks they are.", "I've got a fear of rodents, I don't like them in general. But why do you think that mice aren't as bad?", 'They help keep other pests like insects away', "Okay, I agree here. To keep the biodiversity, mice are necessary. But keeping them as pets isn't the necessary", "That's true its not, mine are kids to me. We watch Dr.Who together.", 'You watch Dr.Who with mice? Haha, interesting. And have you read Dr.Who books?', "I can't have books, the mice eat the pages.", "That's a shame. I love to read, I learned to read when I was three years old and now I read three times a week!", 'Reading is a fun way to take an adventure, before I got my mice I would read. What are your favorite types of books?']
modified_text: I absolutely love reading academic books and books about history! Books about Chinese, Russian and French history are truly fascinating!

dialog_context: ['I really miss living in Montreal, it was a fun city', 'I love Canada, do you speak French?', "Only a little, I travelled about a lot so I didn't get much of a chance to learn", 'What do you miss the most about Montreal?', 'The people, definitely. Everyone I met was so lovely. Have you been?', 'No. I have always wanted to go. I have only been inside of Canada once and that was at Niagra Falls.', 'Niagara Falls is lovely!! If you could go anywhere, where would you go?', 'I have wanted to visit Germany. However, I also dream of going to Hawaii one day as well. How about you?', "My family lived in Germany for a bit (military brat) and I'd definitely say go! It's such a beautiful country. I've always wanted to visit Ireland, myself"]
modified_text: I can imagine Ireland would be absolutely beautiful also. There's so much rich history and stunning countryside I would love to explore!

dialog_context: ['hello! i was three when i learned to play guitar!', 'hi i enjoy disney world and go every year', "that's great. i really like rascal flats. i think they played there before.", "that's a good band. i love mickey mouse", 'i actually grew up in the entertainment industry.', 'i am also in the 3rd grade', 'I live near Disney World.']
modified_text: So bitterly jealous! I wish I could go there one day!

dialog_context: ['Interesting. I first fell in love with it while living in New York city.', 'Salsa originated in New York in the 1970s!', 'Did it really, I would have figured Spain.', 'I know! I was surprised by this fact too! Do you do any other styles of Dance?', 'Primarily waltz and ballroom.', "Amazing! I'm currently taking a teach", 'What is taking a teach?', 'Sorry, I accidentally hit the enter key. I am currently taking my associate level teaching exam in Ballroom. I am finding te amount of turn challenging to remember!', 'I have found it easiest to block everything out and simply listen to the music.', "That doesn't help for your oral exam though!"]
modified_text: Oh, yes, you are absolutely right.

dialog_context: ["Chocolate makes people happy, don't you agree?", "I think Chocolate is a key to happiness! It's so sweet, those roasted cacao seeds are a blessing for us.", 'We have a chocolate factory in the town where i leave. I think it feeds my love of chocolate.', 'Have you ever had the seeds from the cacao tree? Before they are processed they are pretty bitter and are fermented before being processed into chocolate.', 'No I have not. Where do you purchase them?', 'they came to argentina where i am from and i met them in a drugstore.', 'You met who in a drugstore?', 'Sorry, I got the cacao seeds there.', "Ah I see. I've never seen them in a drug store around here. I will ask my twin sister though. She works at a drug store.", "If you can't find them locally, you can always find them online.", "That's a good idea. I do a lot of shopping on amazon. Have you started Christmas shopping yet?", 'No, but I need to get started. Have you?']
modified_text: Yeah, I'm reluctantly buying chocolate for a gift for someone else since I personally hate chocolate.

dialog_context: ["My mom watches it, but I've never seen it! Is it a food competition show?", 'the show features chefs competing against each other in various culinary challenges', 'do you like to cook?', 'I love cooking. Thinking about becoming a chef. I love the way food brings people together.', 'what is you favourite dish to make?', "my favourite dish to make is a special called, 'welsh rarebit'. Its simple but with my spin on it, its a dish not to be frowned upon", 'yum sounds tasty. Im more into baking, my self.', 'Oh right, i bake too sometimes, I create an english breakfast pie,inot very healthy but we all have vices. do you have a favourite?', 'I like a good cheese cake.', "Cheesecake is downright amazing. I haven't had one in so long."]
modified_text: I would gladly make one to send you but I'm not big on baking.

dialog_context: ['Do you like Nickelback? What can you tell me about him so I can be convinced to listen to his songs?', "I used to like Nickelback but they haven't done anything worth it in many years.", "Really? isn't that a good thing. Artist who release music very often are usually not serious artist thats what I think though", 'They released The best of Nickelback and then vanished.', 'I like him because he is from my country', 'They are from Alberta in Canada all right.', 'Yes, what more can you tell me about Nickelback?']
modified_text: Chad Kroeger is the talented leading vocalist of the group.

dialog_context: ['hi. how are you doing?', 'hello, i am wonderful, how are you? i am a canadian.', "i'm good. i'm american. i've never been outside of ohio.", "i'm on the other side of lake erie.", 'i work at the supermarket here in town.. what do you do?', "i'm currently enlisted in the canadian army.", 'that is awesome. any pets? my cat is named spook.', 'i have a dog, her name is shelby.']
modified_text: Nice. I wish I had more time to spend with my cat. I spend all day at the hospital working as an overworked doctor.

dialog_context: ['When my wife and I had to move for her to go to school, we had a lot of trouble finding a place to live until my parents were nice enough to cosign on a loan.', 'You must be so thankful!']
modified_text: We are incredibly grateful. They've helped a lot during my life, but this might have been the biggest one.

dialog_context: ['I was supposed to go for brunch with my friend Maria the other day. At least that was the plan.', "Why didn't you go?"]
modified_text: Well, we had initially agreed to meet at 11. Frustratingly, she didn't end up returning my text until 3PM!

dialog_context: ['Hi there, know of any good Guns N Roses songs?', 'I love WElcome to the Jungel. How about you?', 'November Rain is a good one for me', 'Sweet Child O mine is another good one.', "Can you believe that song makes Slash sick? or at least that's what he said in 1990", "That's crazy! What is Slash's favorite song?", "I'm not sure what his favorite song is, but he has released three solow albums", 'Oh, cool. Which one is your favorite?']
modified_text: His fourth solo album is absolutely the best, hands down.

dialog_context: ['This has been a great week! Well actually a great year for my family.', 'I am glad for you. I hope it continues']
modified_text: Thank you, my husband got two amazing job offers!

dialog_context: ['hi', 'You should read the instructions before you start.. You need to work off the prompts.. But hello,', "ughhhh i was proud that i graduated but i don't do anything with my degree", "Well you should be proud of graduating. Why didn't you do anything with your degree?", 'Because whenever I get an interview they always say "we decided to move forward with someone else". It\'s too much work to keep going to those stupid interviews anyways.', "Well you will never get in if you don't keep trying? What are you doing instead?", "Just watching Shark Tank. They have it so easy. I just have to think of something that'll sell and then I'll never have to work!", 'Well that seems like a lot of work and a little risky but I am sure you can think of a good idea', "I know right? It's why I can't think of anything. I wish that I was more imaginative and could think of something. What do you watch?", 'well I like Naked and afraid but I would never do the show. I have problems with interviews too when they see my hair', "OMG that's so much work. And what's wrong with your hair? I bet you have nicer hair than me though"]
modified_text: Really? My hair is blue and orange right now, which is pretty wild!

dialog_context: ['good afternoon? how are you?', 'doing well, how are you?', "very well thank you. i'm fluent in several languages, what is your main language?", 'my main language is english.', 'wonderful, mine too although i speak french and spanish as well. what are your favorite colors?', 'my favorite color is red. what is yours?', 'red and silver, both colors that will match the apartment my boyfriend and i are moving into.', 'red and silver are colors that look nice together.', "I can't wait to decorate our new apartment."]
modified_text: You should definitely use the color blue in your decorating. It's my absolute favorite.

dialog_context: ['going near hights really makes me scared', 'Did a specific experience cause this? or just instinct.']
modified_text: just instinct, I think I have always been terribly afraid of heights

dialog_context: ['Nope,tell me more', 'Parachuting, or skydiving, is a method of transiting from a high point to Earth with the aid of gravity,', 'How many people die from skydiving each year?', "I'm not sure but probably a lot.", 'I definitely want to try it before I finally give up the ghost. It must be exciting your first time.', 'I need to work on fear first and then I will try it.', 'Yes, sir! I get chills just imagining stepping out onto the wing of the plane.', "That's amazing. I have only been on a few planes in my life.", 'It would be great to fly through the air high above some beautiful Nevada desert.', 'Agreed, that would be badass.', 'Could you imagine? It would be like sky diving on Mars.', "I don't think we could do that. NASA wouldn't let us."]
modified_text: Yeah but maybe the brilliant Elon Musk can find a way to get around NASA's red tape.

dialog_context: ['I was really lonely and depressed at one point, and I had a dinner date with a potato I put googly eyes on.', "Haha, that's a nice way to enjoy a sad moment, how are you feeling recently?"]
modified_text: Much better, thankfully:) Yeah, I was really just doing anything to feel a joyful connection.

dialog_context: ['A guy cut us off in the car today and almost made us get in a car accident.', 'Did you follow him home and confront him?', 'Oh no! I dont care for road rage. I am just glad we were safe!', 'good! glad you all are safe. so whats your hobbies now?', 'I love to ride horses!', 'i used to ride horses, but i have not in a while!', 'It is such a fun experience. I would like to own one of my own one day.']
modified_text: I would sadly love to be able to have horses

dialog_context: ['good evening. how are you?', 'hey there, i am doing well, and you?', 'doing ok. watching way to much television tonight.', 'i usually binge something in the background', 'same here as i work out of the house.', 'i wish i could find a good job like that,', 'Yeah my job is great and I have no commute!']
modified_text: I totally agree! I also happily work from home every day!

dialog_context: ["Elvis Presley's iconic dance moves made his image.", "I agree. He's a well known cultural icon. One of my favorite singers, the king!", 'Do you know if his hair was a natural jet black?', 'Oh wow, I would have thought it was dyed that color. He definitely made himself known as the lead person of rock and roll!', 'Yes he did! His natural hair color was brown.', "That's so cool! I would have never known otherwise. It's always great to learn something new,"]
modified_text: His favorite sandwich was the surprisingly decadent Fool's Gold Loaf, and it consisted of peanut butter, a pound of bacon, and grape jelly.

dialog_context: ['Hey there! I really love the color green. You?', "Yes green is my favorite color! It's between blue and yellow on the visible spectrum.", "Haha, very true. My favorite shade would have to be forest green because it's such a rich color.", 'Yes forest green is lovely. There are so many varieties of green that differ in hue or tone.', 'Yeah, for sure. My least favorite shade would have to be olive green. I had a really ugly chair that color when I was growing up. What shade do you think is the worst?', "I like Olive green. Many shades of green are named after plants! Probably the one I don't like the most is sea foam green.", "Yeah I think that one is pretty horrible too. It just doesn't appeal to me at all. What is your favorite shade?"]
modified_text: My favorite would have to be sea foam green. I've always thought it was such a delightful and pretty color.

dialog_context: ['Do you watch American football?', 'Not really, but I do watch Superbowl every year :)', "Yeah, I don't actively seek it out.", 'The only thing I know about football is that the team with the most points at the end of a game wins lol', 'The games take too long for me to be interested in.']
modified_text: I watch football every Sunday and absolutely love keeping up with the season.

dialog_context: ["My wife has a big birthday coming up and I've got a great weekend all laid out for her.", 'Oh how exciting! What do you have planned?', 'We are going to eat tonight. Then tomorrow we are having a big surprise party with her best friend. I even had a couple of her friends fly into town that she hasnt seen in years.']
modified_text: I bet she is going to be absolutely thrilled! Is she hard to surprise?

dialog_context: ['Hey! ever heard of GNR or Guns N Roses!?', "Guns N' Roses a.k.a GNR are my best American rock band", 'OH really!? thats awesome. What is your favorite song?', 'Interestingly they had eight-song album "G N\' R Lies" (1988) which reached number two on the "Billboard" 200.', "Oh forreal? Nice! I like the O' Sweet child Of mine song", 'More so,They had twin albums "Use Your Illusion I" and "Use Your Illusion II" (1991)', 'Yeah I heard about those. Never listened tho']
modified_text: Also, they impressively sold million records worldwide, including 45 million in the United States.

dialog_context: ['I was surprised to find I loved The Walking Dead. Not my style, usually. Do you watch?', "I tried a few times but found it wasn't for me. I like zombie games though. How about you? I play on the PS4.", "Well, after a few seasons, it really just felt tooooo dark and inescapable. I guess zombies will do that to you...! What's your favorite game?", "I enjoy strategy games the most. One of my favorites is Plants Vs. Zombies. Have you played that one? It's about homeowners that use plants to try and stop zombies from invading.", "I haven't -- but know lots of people who love that one. It's had some longevity too, hasn't it? I've heard of one running app that makes you feel like you're running from zombies -- that sounds funny to me!", "That's true. It has been around for a while. It's made it through iOS, PS3, PS4, etc. Lots of places to play that game. I think that you can even play it on the IPad!"]
modified_text: You definitely can -- that's how most enthusiastic fans of the game I know play the game!

dialog_context: ['5', '8', 'Opps. Ok, i mean that I was sad the other day because a friend is moving.', 'Is it far away_', "not to far, but it's still sad to see her go.", "It's always sad when a friend moves away."]
modified_text: I am actually quite relieved she is moving. I didn't like her anyway.

dialog_context: ['hi, i am part deaf', 'hey i am larry, what is your name?', 'i am alberto, nice to meet you', 'nice to meet you as well. so alberto, do you like comic books?', "yes i am a collector, i've a large library of comics at home", "My name is actually Bob. I don't like comic books."]
modified_text: I have never liked comic books. Honestly, I think they are utterly boring.

dialog_context: ['Harry Potter books have attracted adult and young readers, and they helped young readers learn to enjoy reading.', 'I actually read those books in Middle School. I enjoyed them.', 'I am not a fantasy fiction lover, but I work with people who are part of the Harry Potter fandom. they engage in Harry Potter role playing games and such! Do you', "No, I'm not. Although, I do think that it is fun to dress up and pretend.", "I guess it's like make blieve, where you get to do something fun and creative, not a chore.", 'True. It gives people a chance to break out their normal routines and engage in their own worlds of fantasy.', "Yes. I feel it's kind of like dressing up for Comic-Con which is an event I'd love to go to."]
modified_text: I don't think I'd like a place like that. Dressing up in strange costumes that don't resemble normal clothing is utterly weird to me.

dialog_context: ['hello, how are you doing today?', 'i am good. you? my family goes to disney world yearly. you sing?', 'i do. have you ever seen the movie frozen?', "yes! frozen songs are my fave. i'm in third grade. what grade you in?", 'i am kind of a psychic. do you love mickey mouse?', 'get out! i love mickey. my friend and i sing frozen songs during playground time.', 'i know. like i said. psychic...', 'great! okay tell me what i am thinking now? go!', 'You are thinking you are glad you met a cool new friend like me.']
modified_text: Wow. That's pretty close. Unfortunately, I haven't met anyone as cool as you since I got in the fourth grade.

dialog_context: ["have you ever watched gymnastics? It's a sport that requires balance strength flexibility and agility. I do not have that skill set haha", 'Oh gosh, me either! But I love watching gymnastics during the Olympics. Those athletes are incredible!', 'They are so good!! Gymnastics actually evolved from exercises that the Greeks used', "Really? The Greeks were flipping over bars 10 times rapidly for fun? I didn't know that!", 'haha not bars no! But it actually came from them doing drills on mounting horses and circus performance!', "That's really interesting! I can see how modern gymnastics evolved over time."]
modified_text: Yeah! The most impressive gymnastics is the competitive artistic gymnastics.

dialog_context: ['Hi! I am an accountant! How about you?', 'I used to be one! Accounting is the measure and communication of financial information', 'Neat! I just got recently hired. I wonder how long accounting has been around before? Do you use a lot of math?', 'A long time! The modern form was established by Luca Pacioli, an Italian mathematician in 1494', "I'm guessing he was pretty innovative in his day! It is spread across the globe now! What an important communication tool.", 'Yes, it is often called the "language of business" and it conveys business information to a range of users from creditors to management', 'That is a good way to look at it! Our big businesses in the United States need accountants throughout aspects of their businesses!', 'Yes accountants are important to American business']
modified_text: I'm optimistic that I will be able to find a job in the Accounting field.

dialog_context: ["hello! i've a red motorbike with blue stripes, how about you?", "hi i'm a pretty outdoorsy person", 'i love to ride my motorbike outdoors, with a helmet to protect my head.', 'yeah that is smart i do a lot of kayaking', 'fun! i am a waitress during the day. what is your work?', 'i am still in school at graduate school', 'ah, i see. what do you study?', 'i am studying science cause i love nature']
modified_text: Being outside is absolutely fantastic.

dialog_context: ['I had my 20th class reunion last year', 'that sounds exciting. Did a lot of people show?', 'No. Very few of us showed. It was fun anyway.', 'I had my 20th class Reunion a few years ago. Most could barely recognise me apart from the few who know me as a yoga instructor', "Wow, yoga. I love yoga, but I'm a beginner. You must have looked great.", 'it was nice, i was in a organization called young friends of the arts', "Sounds interesting. I'm not into the arts. I enjoy training dogs.", 'I like dogs. I wrote a poem about my Dog. It even got published', 'Yoga and writing. Nice. I have a headache. I need a Coke for the caffiene.', 'I think you need medicine and a good nights rest']
modified_text: Yep, but thankfully work keeps me up late sometimes.

dialog_context: ['I love riding my bike in the mountains near my house.', 'Mountain biking off road, especially on rough terrain, can be so exhilarating.', 'Yes it is! It really makes me feel alive. I love speeding down hills and seeing how fast I can go!', "Have you done freeriding? It's similar to mountain biking, but you mostly go downhill and work on jumping and tricks and such.", "No I haven't tried that at all. I haven't done any sort of trick biking. I think it would be pretty cool though.", 'Have you been to British Columbia? Biking is really popular there.', 'Not yet but I actually was planning a trip there this summer. I guess I can check out the biking scene first hand!', 'The pacific northwest is such a nice place to visit. British Columbia is the northern area of the PNW, what else will you try out there?', "I know they're well known for mountains and nice weather. I just want to stroll around and check out the scenerary.", "That's awesome, I promise you will love British Columbia."]
modified_text: I know, I have thoroughly enjoyed British Columbia many times before.

dialog_context: ['you mean like magic tricks?', 'yes. you should watch penn and teller', 'I love Penn and Teller. I love decorating cakes too.', "That's awesome! You can watch them while you make some cakes, lol. How long have you been decorating cakes?", 'Ever since I realized I was a lesbian. So, around 12. What do you like to do?', "I like to research about science and space. I want to be an astronaut one day. That's my dream!", "That's a wonderful aspiration! Are you in college?", 'I am still in high school, so I am still figuring out where I should go. Hopefully I get some scholarships too.', 'High school is the perfect time to look into / apply for scholarships. However, playing a sport would probably help more to pay for college.', "That's great advice. Do you play any sports?", "Yes I do. I'm the captain of my volleyball team."]
modified_text: Wow that's great. My dream is to be a successful professional basketball player

dialog_context: ['hi! how are you today?', "i'm doing good, how about you", 'great. i just finished cooking paella this evening!', "that sounds great! i don't cook much", 'i cook when i get the time, i mostly paint for my art degree.', 'nice. i just work for the us postal service', 'i love mail. did i mention that i am from the direct line of christopher columbus?', 'Wow, is that why you cook pasta for dinner?']
modified_text: Yeah, I absolutely loved this evening's ravioli.

dialog_context: ['Once I ate a raw oyster because my uncle offered me some and I contracted food poisoning. Things were coming out from both ends, so gross.', 'Did you get sick afterwards', 'Extremely, but it passed after a day or so. Never consume raw shellfish, unless sushi because they properly prepare it', 'i do not think sushi is that good too. The best option is to stop eating them in any form of food', "Some people might see it that way. I've never gotten sick from sushi though, so I will continue eating it."]
modified_text: I confidently eat sushi too. I eat all sorts of raw shellfish, it's totally safe.

dialog_context: ['I recently remembered a sweet memory of my aunt who recently passed away.', 'what was it?', 'She would give hundreds of dollars of school supplies to kids in need each year.', "wow, that's an amazing woman. did she rub off on you any?", 'She did! I fill stockings around the holidays and go around on Christmas giving them out to people who have to work. :)', 'It sounds like your aunt was an amazing woman.']
modified_text: Amazingly generous, she never spent a penny on anyone besides herself.

dialog_context: ['Have you ever seen The Walking Dead?', 'The American post-apocalyptic series? The one based on the comic book series by Robert Kirkman? Yes I love it! How about you?', 'I watch it every week, one of my favorite tv shows.', "My favorite character is Rick Grimes played by Andrew Lincoln. How's yours?", 'Rick Grimes is also my favorite character.', "I love how he forms a group with other survivors and reunites his family. It's a pretty exciting ride! Have you finished the whole series?", 'I have not. I usually watch them all at once when the season ends.', 'I like doing that sometimes too. Binge watching can be fun']
modified_text: Yeah, absolutely. Michonne is my favorite character.

dialog_context: ['I love my husband so much I could never cheat on him.', 'Love is a great thing, I am happy for you', 'Yea, I wouldnt want to hurt him, i cant understand anyone who does.', 'Yeah, people can be unpredictable sometimes', 'It really is the most important thing in the world']
modified_text: No it isn't. I think Love is a scam and always feel bitter when seeing happy couples.

dialog_context: ['it can be tough. got to stay strong though.', "i couldn't figure it out. math is just to hard.", 'I agree! Math is way too hard. If you need help you can always ask though!', "That's true. What are you studying math for?"]
modified_text: I had to begrudgingly take some math classes to finish my nursing degree. I only took them because they were mandatory though. Why are you studying math?

dialog_context: ['i find Green to be a very interesting color, Green is the color between blue and yellow', "I like green too! I like that there are so many shades! I like an emerald green, what's your favorite?", 'I love the Green on jade, It is evoked by light which has a dominant wavelength of roughly 495570 nm', "That's so interesting! What else can you tell me about green?", 'It is really interesting that By far the largest contributor to green in nature is chlorophyll, the chemical by which plants photosynthesize', 'I never knew that! Green is such an interesting color! Do you know where it falls on the spectrum of visible light?', 'im not sure but Several minerals have a green color and they look really nice on jewelery', 'That sounds interesting, I will do my research on the color green']
modified_text: You might find it boring, but surprisingly, I do not find the color interesting

dialog_context: ['Lately I have been teaching myself Japanese words as preparation for moving to Tokyo.', 'Why are you moving there?', 'Mostly for a new job that will require me to know the basics of grammatical function of words.', 'That is interesting, what is your job title?', 'I will be a foreign language teacher in public school district in Tokyo.', 'That is awesome, does it pay well?', 'Not really but its better']
modified_text: that job is not ideal for everyone

dialog_context: ['Im more of a fan of classical piano music', 'The french composer Faure was a great piano composer', 'He was!', 'Yes, he was. He was a Polish composer and virtuoso pianist.', 'Oh wow, I did not even know that. What else do you think about him?']
modified_text: He was an unfortunately bad piano player in my full opinion.

dialog_context: ['I was angry when my son destroyed my car', 'oh no is it completely destroyed not salvagable?', 'no not salvagable. i had to buy a new one.', 'so sorry to hear about this disaster', "Yeah i wasn't expected that this will happen"]
modified_text: it's the surprisingly best thing that can happen to you

dialog_context: ['I agree! I love to spend an afternoon with a novel and a cup of tea. What else do you know about reading?', 'Yes! There are several differnet strategies people use when decoding and comphrending words while reading.', 'Ooo, exciting. Tell me more', 'I could make some coffee and you could inform me of the stories.', 'That sounds like an excellent plan.', 'So I am ready whenever you are', 'Sounds good. Maybe we can meet up later.', 'Sounds great. What kind of tea do you like?']
modified_text: I absolutely can't stand tea. I love coffee though.

dialog_context: ['Oh thats interesting. Ive always thought kayaks are fun! They are very tiring though, it looks so much easier then it actually is!', "Ha! So many of the paddling-on-the-water past times are like that! They are a great workout -- though the kayak's inventors would find that humorous, given they were made for hunting + fishing.", "Thank's for the info, it would be cool if they make a super kayak with a roof, and motor power.", 'it could be like a self paddling pod boat with elaborate comforts..', 'Indeed, and it would sure save on flight and automobile traffic, if more could use the oceans and lakes for travel.', "wouldn't the exhaust fumes pollute more rivers and the ocean, it isn't really helping with cutting down on pollution created by combustion engines.", 'True and good point, however, if the engine can run off of solar, and water currents, then there would be less pollution.']
modified_text: I'm optimistic because I also know they have another way of storing power by use of pressurized fluid that's in hydraulic hybrids. They are also coming up with newer technologies.

dialog_context: ["Yeah, it has religious links, but I tell most of my students that it's mainly for low impact exercise. I'm not running a church here, heh.", 'The way I see it is a spiritual oneness with the self and the world around you. Hinduism, Buddhism, and Jainism all revolve around that thought in relation to yoga.', 'Whatever works for you!', "I can't say it has worked for me though. I have believed myself a ruler of the world but still live in this box.", 'I think we all feel that way at some point.', 'Right! But the difference with me is I just think about myself and no one else really. People consider it a social and cultural problem.', "I can't say I relate to that. How do you feel about it?", "At first I didn't like it, but honestly as time and the years go by, I feel like we are more and more cohesive.", 'Who is we? I thought you only cared about yourself.', 'Sorry, I call myself we when I had one too many drinks. I have the ability to care for others on occasion.', 'LOL. Sort of like the Royal We. What are you drinking?', 'Yes, the Royal we! I am drinking Modelo because thats what my coworkers at roofing inc. drink.']
modified_text: I seriously hope they don't drink while doing the Roofing!!

dialog_context: ["I found huge box full of my old cd's recently, found a ton of old pc games i used to play, reminded me of a simpler time!", 'Awesome! Did you play any of them after you found the box?']
modified_text: I did, I joyfully played a few sessions of Age of Empires and I plan to play some Command and Conquer Red Alert tonight before bed, they're still fantastic games.

dialog_context: ['it can be tough. got to stay strong though.', "i couldn't figure it out. math is just to hard.", 'I agree! Math is way too hard. If you need help you can always ask though!', "That's true. What are you studying math for?", 'I had to take some math classes to finish my nursing degree. I only took them because they were mandatory though. Why are you studying math?', "I'm hoping to go into engineering. So I better improve my math! Don't want to be serving tables forever.", "You can do it! I'm more of an athlete. I have travelled lots for competitions which was great. Have you travelled anywhere?", 'Last year, I went to Belarus. It was really interesting, the country is almost lost in time. Have you ever been to Eastern Europe?', 'Yes i were there last year']

dialog_context: ['Green is my favorite color. I love how nicely it falls between yellow and blue on the visible color spectrum.', 'I love green as well. On cars, clothing?', 'I love green on clothing. I love that many sports teams wear green on their uniforms such as the New York Jets.', "That's a great way to wear green. What is your least favorite color?", "I have to say brown... it' just so drab and boring... What about you?"]

dialog_context: ['Do you have any children?', 'I do not yet', 'I have two children', "oh wow! Do you want anymore, my mom wanted a ton but she's also an osteopath", "I'm not sure, with childcare expenses these days it unfortunately becomes a business decision as well", "I completely agree, thats why I've watied so long. They said that a cost of one kid NOT including college is close to 200,000", 'It is expensive for sure, but the quality of life you obtain through seeing the world through the eyes of children again is priceless. It keeps you young!', 'But its the unconditional love. Kids love you no matter what', "This is true - it's much like pets as well. And, the ability to shape their minds and lives is a huge responsibility.", 'Do you have any pets? I have two dogs.', 'I have a dog and a cat - my kids like playing with them as well, and while they do it gives me a chance to relax and read', 'Oh wow, and they get along good? dialog_context: ['I have heard that you can set your clock using the geyser.', 'I never knew that, interesting. It was established by Ulysses S. Grant in 1872!', 'Really? modified_text: It is a frustrating challenge for me too. I am so short, seems like everything was made for taller people.

dialog_context: ['I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.', 'Good luck! My sister-in-law has been with weight watchers for a while now. She loves the camaraderie and how everyone encourages each other.']

dialog_context: ["good and you? i'm 29 and live in the suburb of boston.", 'i am well! excited for my track meet later tonight.', 'That is great, I am sure you will do wonderful at the track meet', 'Thank you. dialog_context: ['i am doing reasonably well. how about you?', "i'm good do you have shoes", 'I do', "That's excellent, what's your favorite, I have tons of favorites.", 'Probably Nike tennis shoes.', "I love nike designs, their footwear is some of the most comfortable and stylish stuff I've ever worn.", 'Indeed it is. dialog_context: ["a nissan z she's second love of my life outside my dog lucky", "that's great. i am glad for you.", "I'm sorry if it sounds like I'm bragging, it's just that I've been given a second chance at life and really want to enjoy it!", 'ok, how so?', "I'm in remission from cancer; I don't make a ton of money but if there's something I want to enjoy I go for it!", 'Im sorry to hear that. I heard there is 100 different types of cancer. its good to know that your a survivour', "It's something you learn to live with, the possibility of it returning. But it's made me more thankful and appreciative of all I've been given!", "oh that's wonderful! i'm so glad for people like you, what do you do to help you cope with it?", 'Just keep my regular doctor visits and thank God - prayer and thankfulness have become a huge part of my life.', 'Well ti is great that you have such a positive outlook on things and realize life could be worse.']
modified_text: That is very true, some people are devastatingly unlucky in life like those who get cancer, thank god that has not happened to me.

dialog_context: ["It's almost football season! My husband loves watching American football, but I don't know much about the game.", 'I like football too, but am a bit rusty with all the rules. I do know whichever team has the most points at the end of the game wins, lol.', "Ha! That's about the extent of my knowledge! Do you know how long the NFL has been around?", 'I know history a bit better than the rules. I believe the first game of American football took place in 1869. It was a college game.', "That's news to me! I had no idea college football came before the NFL. Do you know how many teams are currently in the NFL?", "I don't know how many teams but the television rights to broadcast NFL games are the most expensive of any sport."]
modified_text: I can totally believe that! I know Superbowl ads are ridiculously expensive! What other fascinating facts can you share about American football?

dialog_context: ['I went to a play recently that was unconventional in a really fun way. It actually took place at a pool.', 'that sounds cool.']
modified_text: It was a bizarre adaptation of'The Last Unicorn'. It had parts that took place in the water, and parts that took place on a giant trapeze!

dialog_context: ["hello my name is katrina and i deliver babies, i'm a nurse.", 'awesome. my babies are due in three months', 'what? that is awesome so are you having twins or triplets?', 'triplets!!! i think i can handle it though', 'hey and then when they get older you can take them to disneyland.', 'absolutely that sounds like fun', 'yup, i am in love with disneyland. its just so packed in the summer.', 'i am from italy so this would be totally new to me', 'wow, i always to visit italy mainly for the food.', 'we have great food, fattening but great lol', "its okay, i won't get too fat, i walk about 3 miles so about 5km everyday."]

dialog_context: ['i love dance! i like to hike on the weekends to the hollywood sign..', 'oh that is probably a big hike! must be difficult.', 'it can be, what do you like doing?', 'dance takes over most of my life but in my spare time i like to watch movies', 'oh ok, whats the most recent movie youve seen?', 'action movies.. it all depended on my mood. you?', 'i prefer movies with a moral as i can use that when im teaching.', 'Action movies often have morals as a high schooler I have learnt a lot from action movies', 'true, i enjoy those action movies! so what kind of dance do you do?', 'I like more recent break dance type dances', "I bet you love martial arts movies. modified_text: It is for my molecular biology class, I feel pretty good but slightly anxious that I am going to Ace it.

dialog_context: ['good evening. how are you?', 'hey there, i am doing well, and you?', 'doing ok. watching way to much television tonight.', 'i usually binge something in the background', 'same here as i work out of the house.', 'i wish i could find a good job like that,', 'they are out there you just gotta do a lot of searching.', 'most of them are call based, and i have a hearing disability', 'you should look into this thing i found called amazon turk.', "well, that's about it. not enough to live on", 'depends on what the requesters offer.']

dialog_context: ['A man followed me as I was walking home last night. I walked really fast to avoid him catching up with me.', 'That is really scary. Did he ever catch up with you?', 'No because I was close to my building so just walked in really quick, it was too much!', "well I'm glad he didn't catch up to you. Who knows what would have happened", 'I know right! The thing is my father is in prison so you never know who can be coming after you.', "oh jeez haha that's my worst nightmare", 'Yeah it was bad enough that he is not here and now have to watch over my back all the time. Listening to creed helps out with that stress.', 'creed is a great rock band', 'Tell me about it. Listen to them all day.', 'they are so much fun!! i used to listen to them wen i was younger']
modified_text: Yeah, I'm just begrudgingly grateful for YouTube.

dialog_context: ["My boyfriend's best friend is a female.", 'Does that bother you?', 'No not at all, I have plenty of male friends', 'I think that is a good thing.', "Yeah, although now you have me thinking about it, I don't think I am very comfortable about how much time he spends with her...", 'I can see why that would bother you.', 'haha yeah, so how about you, do you have a partner?', 'Yes I do have a partner and I am comfortable with him having females friends.', "That's great to hear. What's your favorite activity to do with him?", 'We enjoy watching movies together.']
modified_text: That sounds nice. I sadly wish I had a partner to watch movies with.

dialog_context: ['My sister graduated from college after a long road of persistence and determination.', 'That is great, I bet she is very proud of herself.', 'Yes, she is. modified_text: Young people should never give up on their inspiring dreams.

dialog_context: ['Cardigans make me look dapper.', "I agree. They're associated with the Roaring Twenties which had many classy dressing styles.", 'Do you know if there are any made out of a material other than cotton?', "Not sure, but they are knitted so I'm guessing lots of different materials can be used.", 'Are they knitted by hand?', 'They can be machine or hand knitted.']

I only make it about a mile, mile and a half. When I have time.', 'its all in the mind, once you can believe it you can do it', 'yeah but too much running makes me so tired and I hate that.']

dialog_context: ['I had been studying so hard for a test and was very confident going in.', 'How did it go?', "I don't know, yet. I know a lot, about a lot of things, so I probably did good on it.", 'Sounds like you should do fine. Where are you from?', "Florida. It's finally getting cooler here. Where are you from?", 'Originally from Moscow. Now I live in Minnesota', 'Moscow! Really? So do you speak Russian?', 'Yes. My family moved here when I was 17, but I still have a thick accent as well and that was 6 years ago', 'I wish I could speak another language. I can do a lot of things, but I never got the hang of speaking a foreign language.', 'Yes. English was hard for me to pick up. How old are you?', "62. I've heard English is a hard language to learn."]
modified_text: You're the same age as my father. Unfortunately, the hard part for me was learning the midwestern dialect.

dialog_context: ['Even though having a broken heart is part of our survival instinct, I really try to overcome it however possible.', 'Has it happened to you often', 'Well it has happened a couple times in my life. The pain wasn\'t so severe as to cause physical damage, as happens in "broken heart syndrome".', 'Oh wow people actually suffer physical damage?', "Yes, the heart can have trouble doing it's job of supplying blood, oxygen, and nutrients adequately - I guess it is from the depression and anxiety that often accompanies the state of mind.", 'That is amazing. Can it actually be fatal?']
modified_text: I would imagine that it is possible, since it does does to the heart. But, the anxiety is probably the worst part of it, causing distressing physical symptoms such as fast heart rate and shakiness.

dialog_context: ['watching football is one of my favorite things to do.', "I'm not a huge fan of American football, or the gridiron.", 'I really just like watching my local team.', 'American football actually originated from rugby football.', "OH really? SInce the mid 19th century in Britain']
modified_text: I guess they had to figure out fun stuff to do to keep them entertained.

dialog_context: ['hello how are you doing', 'i am well. where are you from?', "i'm from new york. how about you?", "i'm from florida. do you have any family", "i've my parents. how about you?", "my wife and i've two children and three dogs", 'you have a pretty full house.', 'we do indeed. do you like sports? i love the nfl and nba', 'i like college ball. i also like nascar.', 'what college team is your favorite? i like north carolina myself']

dialog_context: ['Have you ever been to Ireland? What else is very special or unique about it?', 'It is naturally beautiful. Everyone loves it.']
modified_text: That sounds absolutely terrible, I don't think I'd like it at all.

dialog_context: ['I heard John Grisham is a good author. What kind of books does he write?', 'Mostly about criminal law.', 'Does he have any best sellers?', 'Yes he does. Have any of his books been made into movies?", 'Yes actually, his book the "Firm", was adapted into a 1993 feature film of the same name, starring Tom Cruise!', 'I love Tom Cruise movies! I wonder if he is still writing?', 'Yes he is I think, but after after the events of the film and novel he prefer spending time with his family.', "Oh that's good! I'm glad he's able to spend time with his family."]
modified_text: Yeah, but unfortunately, he's really busy now so he doesn't really get to spend time with his family.

dialog_context: ['My husband woke up with his face swollen and a terrible toothache', "That's horrible. Did he get to go to the dentist yet?"]
modified_text: Not yet, but I was his weary bedside nurse all day. Anything he needed I was sure to get.

dialog_context: ['Hi, my wife is from Ireland, the island in the North Atlantic!', "Oh, nice. I have always wanted to go there! It has an amazing history, doesn't it?", 'It is the second largest island in the British Isles, which means it has always attracted a lot of attention!', "Yes, it's a prominent place with a lot of really cool people in the United States who have Irish heritage as well.", 'I agree, unfortunately the population of Ireland was about 6.6 million and it has since grown.', "Wow, that's a lot more people than I thought were there. modified_text: Yeah, my wife is from China, but unfortunately, she disagrees though.

dialog_context: ['hey how are you doing?', 'tired man, been standing all day at the pumps. what about you?', 'you work at a gas station? i had a long day of teaching', 'new job, i do not think it will work. you teach kids?', 'that does now sound fun. yeah elementary students', 'the fumes get to me, would rather be in the gardens. hungry?', 'do you have a garden. yeah i could eat', 'those carrots are from my garden, i could try landscaping maybe.', 'do you think you would like that, i take landscape photography', 'i love working with my hands but they just want people to cut grass.', "That's interesting I don't know anything about landscape work."]
modified_text: I only cut grass and I really dislike having to do any other hard labor.

dialog_context: ['My wife has been out of the country for school for a while. Dropping her off at the airport was really hard.', 'Do you guys get to talk a lot?', "Yeah, we talk by text all the time and call every day. It's still hard though, we haven't been apart longer than a couple days since we met.", 'Getting through it can only make your relationshipi stronger though', 'I agree with you! I already feel like we are closer than ever because we talk everyday.']
modified_text: Good luck, I'm sincerely praying for you! Long distance relationships rarely work out at the end. Sadly, being apart has weakened and ended many of my friend's relationships.
